body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Haven Customer Service. My name is Jeremy Barnes. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you Martha. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm very upset about the service I received at your dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Martha. Can you provide me with your phone number so we can better assist you with this issue?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five three two one nine zero eight seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Martha. And may I also have your email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email is martha.evans@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Martha. We will look into the matter and get back to you as soon as possible.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time and for contacting Car Haven Customer Service. Have a great day, Martha.
